name: CeMathery
description:
Use Fullscreen!!! Its better

What you are playing now is only a prototype, but it shows what the main characteristics of this new project are.

This prototype was made in 10 days, being most of it made from ready-made assets (they are all in the credits). The central idea is to create an RPG, where to perform each action the player needs to answer a multiplication before. There is almost no balancing and a lot of bugs :)

The final version will have another scenario and theme, but the same idea. One thing that has not been implemented yet, is the possibility of changing weapons, each with its own equations to solve.

The goal is to release this game for Android. This prototype was made just to present the idea.

So guys, what do you think? give us your opinion and ideas!
